QuestData.Title: Due Cause to Celebrate
QuestData.Description: This isn't exactly my idea of the best place to talk.$B$BShall we return to your outpost? It will be a much better place to celebrate.$B$BI'll teleport us there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Magister Krelas at Vol'jin's Pride.
QuestData.RewardText: With this crystal, we can connect your tower to the ley line network at last!$B$BI also made some modifications to your blueprint that should make it much easier to build another tower in your garrison.
